tag.name: footer
tag.description: Footer for a page or section

tag.name: header
tag.description: Introductory or navigational aids for a page or section

tag.name: main
tag.description: Container for the dominant contents of the document

tag.name: time
tag.description: Machine-readable equivalent of date- or time-related data

attribute.name: allow
attribute.description: Permissions policy to be applied to the iframe's contents

attribute.name: allowfullscreen
attribute.description: Whether to allow the iframe's contents to use requestFullscreen()

attribute.name: alpha
attribute.description: Allow the color's alpha component to be set

attribute.name: as
attribute.description: Potential destination for a preload request (for rel=preload and rel=modulepreload)
attribute.type: Potential destination, for rel=preload; script-like destination, for rel=modulepreload

attribute.name: async
attribute.description: Execute script when available, without blocking while fetching

attribute.name: autocapitalize
attribute.description: Recommended autocapitalization behavior (for supported input methods)

attribute.name: autocomplete
attribute.description: Default setting for autofill feature for controls in the form

attribute.name: autocomplete
attribute.type: Autofill field name and related tokens*

attribute.name: autocorrect
attribute.description: Recommended autocorrection behavior (for supported input methods)

attribute.name: autofocus
attribute.description: Automatically focus the element when the page is loaded

attribute.name: autoplay
attribute.description: Hint that the media resource can be started automatically when the page is loaded

attribute.name: blocking
attribute.description: Whether the element is potentially render-blocking
attribute.type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens*

attribute.name: closedby
attribute.description: Which user actions will close the dialog

attribute.name: colorspace
attribute.description: The color space of the serialized color

attribute.name: command
attribute.description: Indicates to the targeted element which action to take.

attribute.name: commandfor
attribute.description: Targets another element to be invoked.

attribute.name: crossorigin
attribute.description: How the element handles crossorigin requests

attribute.name: decoding
attribute.description: Decoding hint to use when processing this image for presentation

attribute.name: default
attribute.description: Enable the track if no other text track is more suitable

attribute.name: dirname
attribute.description: Name of form control to use for sending the element's directionality in form submission

attribute.name: download
attribute.description: Whether to download the resource instead of navigating to it, and its filename if so

attribute.name: enterkeyhint
attribute.description: Hint for selecting an enter key action

attribute.name: fetchpriority
attribute.description: Sets the priority for fetches initiated by the element

attribute.name: form
attribute.description: Associates the element with a form element
attribute.relatedTags: button; fieldset; input; object; output; select; textarea; form-associated custom elements

attribute.name: formaction
attribute.description: URL to use for form submission
attribute.type: Valid non-empty URL potentially surrounded by spaces

attribute.name: formenctype
attribute.description: Entry list encoding type to use for form submission

attribute.name: formmethod
attribute.description: Variant to use for form submission

attribute.name: formnovalidate
attribute.description: Bypass form control validation for form submission

attribute.name: formtarget
attribute.type: Valid navigable target name or keyword

attribute.name: imagesizes
attribute.description: Image sizes for different page layouts (for rel=preload)

attribute.name: imagesrcset
attribute.description: Images to use in different situations, e.g., high-resolution displays, small monitors, etc. (for rel=preload)
attribute.type: Comma-separated list of image candidate strings

attribute.name: inputmode
attribute.description: Hint for selecting an input modality

attribute.name: integrity
attribute.description: Integrity metadata used in Subresource Integrity checks [SRI]

attribute.name: is
attribute.type: Valid custom element name of a defined customized built-in element

attribute.name: itemid
attribute.description: Global identifier for a microdata item
attribute.type: Valid URL potentially surrounded by spaces

attribute.name: itemprop
attribute.description: Property names of a microdata item
attribute.type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens consisting of valid absolute URLs, defined property names, or text*

attribute.name: itemref
attribute.type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens consisting of IDs*

attribute.name: itemtype
attribute.description: Item types of a microdata item
attribute.type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens consisting of valid absolute URLs*

attribute.name: loop
attribute.description: Whether to loop the media resource

attribute.name: muted
attribute.description: Whether to mute the media resource by default

attribute.name: nomodule
attribute.description: Prevents execution in user agents that support module scripts

attribute.name: nonce
attribute.description: Cryptographic nonce used in Content Security Policy checks [CSP]

attribute.name: novalidate
attribute.description: Bypass form control validation for form submission

attribute.name: open
attribute.description: Whether the dialog box is showing

attribute.name: pattern
attribute.description: Pattern to be matched by the form control's value
attribute.type: Regular expression matching the JavaScript Pattern production

attribute.name: ping
attribute.type: Set of space-separated tokens consisting of valid non-empty URLs

attribute.name: placeholder
attribute.description: User-visible label to be placed within the form control

attribute.name: playsinline
attribute.description: Encourage the user agent to display video content within the element's playback area

attribute.name: popover
attribute.description: Makes the element a popover element

attribute.name: popovertarget
attribute.description: Targets a popover element to toggle, show, or hide

attribute.name: popovertargetaction
attribute.description: Indicates whether a targeted popover element is to be toggled, shown, or hidden

attribute.name: poster
attribute.description: Poster frame to show prior to video playback
attribute.type: Valid non-empty URL potentially surrounded by spaces

attribute.name: preload
attribute.description: Hints how much buffering the media resource will likely need

attribute.name: referrerpolicy
attribute.description: Referrer policy for fetches initiated by the element
attribute.relatedTags: a; area; iframe; img; link; script

attribute.name: required
attribute.description: Whether the control is required for form submission

attribute.name: sandbox
attribute.type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens, ASCII case-insensitive, consisting of

attribute.name: shadowrootclonable
attribute.description: Sets clonable on a declarative shadow root

attribute.name: shadowrootcustomelementregistry
attribute.description: Enables declarative shadow roots to indicate they will use a custom element registry

attribute.name: shadowrootdelegatesfocus
attribute.description: Sets delegates focus on a declarative shadow root

attribute.name: shadowrootserializable
attribute.description: Sets serializable on a declarative shadow root

attribute.name: sizes
attribute.type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens, ASCII case-insensitive, consisting of sizes*

attribute.name: sizes
attribute.description: Image sizes for different page layouts

attribute.name: spellcheck
attribute.description: Whether the element is to have its spelling and grammar checked

attribute.name: srcdoc
attribute.description: A document to render in the iframe
attribute.type: The source of an iframe srcdoc document*

attribute.name: srcset
attribute.description: Images to use in different situations, e.g., high-resolution displays, small monitors, etc.
attribute.type: Comma-separated list of image candidate strings

attribute.name: step
attribute.description: Granularity to be matched by the form control's value
attribute.type: Valid floating-point number greater than zero, or any

attribute.name: translate
attribute.description: Whether the element is to be translated when the page is localized

attribute.name: wrap
attribute.description: How the value of the form control is to be wrapped for form submission

attribute.name: writingsuggestions
attribute.description: Whether the element can offer writing suggestions or not.

attribute.name: onafterprint
attribute.description: afterprint event handler for Window object

attribute.name: onbeforeprint
attribute.description: beforeprint event handler for Window object

attribute.name: onbeforeunload
attribute.description: beforeunload event handler for Window object

attribute.name: onhashchange
attribute.description: hashchange event handler for Window object

attribute.name: onlanguagechange
attribute.description: languagechange event handler for Window object

attribute.name: onmessage
attribute.description: message event handler for Window object

attribute.name: onmessageerror
attribute.description: messageerror event handler for Window object

attribute.name: onoffline
attribute.description: offline event handler for Window object

attribute.name: ononline
attribute.description: online event handler for Window object

attribute.name: onpagehide
attribute.description: pagehide event handler for Window object

attribute.name: onpagereveal
attribute.description: pagereveal event handler for Window object

attribute.name: onpageshow
attribute.description: pageshow event handler for Window object

attribute.name: onpageswap
attribute.description: pageswap event handler for Window object

attribute.name: onpopstate
attribute.description: popstate event handler for Window object

attribute.name: onrejectionhandled
attribute.description: rejectionhandled event handler for Window object

attribute.name: onstorage
attribute.description: storage event handler for Window object

attribute.name: onunhandledrejection
attribute.description: unhandledrejection event handler for Window object
